alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Seminole; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:19PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Seminole, central Lake and northwestern Orange Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near DeBary to near Wekiwa Springs State Park to Zellwood to near Leesburg. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Sanford, Apopka, Altamonte Springs and Ocoee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Seminole; Southern Lake County
